fcb_fab_flexible_title: Low Volume PCB Assembly with Amazing Turnaround & Good Quality
fcb_fab_flexible_overview_top_word_zero: Low volume PCB assembly is one of the advanced PCB assembly solutions provided by PCBONLINE. Low volume refers to 5 to 2,000 pieces circuit boards that need soldering parts on. This kind of PCB assembly is done quickly and mainly used for electronic samples production, product testing, and small-scale manufacturing.
fcb_fab_flexible_overview_top_word_one: Low volume PCB assembly is same to normal or high volume assembly in techniques and process, but the work volume is smaller and thus the turnaround is much quicker.
fcb_fab_flexible_advantages_bottom_word_: • Suitable for product functionality test and ideal for developing new products.
• You can have a beforehand knowledge of the final PCB design.
• Methods for testing and evaluation are the same with normal volume assembly.
• All types of printed circuits can be assembled in small amount by a complex PCB supplier.
• Lower price and cost-effectiveness is another feature of low volume PCBs.
• After the assembly, you can easily find out any problem in your original design and make repaires.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_title: Why Choose Low Volume PCB Assembly from PCBONLINE
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_one: • We have a quick turn PCB factory and the lead time for low volume PCB assembly is unbelievably short.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_two: • We are a professional advanced PCB supplier & assembler, where you can order complex PCB such as the flexible, aluminum, high frequency, multilayer, etc..
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_three: • You can get SMT and DIP assembly customized to your needs from us.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_four: • No matter how small your assembly amount is, and how complex your circuit is, our low volume PCB assembly is quality-guaranteed.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_five: • From manufacturing to assembly, the low volume PCB can be finished within only 8 hours.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_six: • PCBONLINE provides a new sketch of designs or other prototypes if your original is not that ideal.

fcb_fab_flexible_related_title: Other Users Are Also Getting a Quote to Related Assembly Solutions
fcb_fab_flexible_related_rigid_word: If you order turnkey PCB assembly from PCBONLINE, you will get perfect EMS service and ready-to-use electronic products. All you need to provide is only your requirements, and we will make the best products as you wish.
fcb_fab_flexible_related_tick_word: High volume PCB assembly refers to a large quantity of printed circuit board assemblies of 10,000 pieces or more, including DFM checking and DFT checking.
fcb_fab_flexible_related_multilayer_word: Have all the components and the printed circuit boards but don't know how to solder them into the PCBA? Then you can get the consigned PCB assembly service here.
